Hi! I'm
Shanisya Lahida
Full-Stack Developer

I'm a web development student at Epitech, learning how to build clean, functional, and user-focused websites. I'm still growing my skills, but I love solving problems, experimenting with new tools, and turning ideas into real projects. This portfolio is a place to document what I'm learning and what I'm creating along the way.

Services

Full-Stack Development

Developing the Front-End and the Back-End of a website, where it tackles both the client-side and server-side. Front-End involves designing user-friendly interfaces. Back-End ensures the site operates smoothly and data is secured.

Responsive Design Services

Designing flexible layout and images, ensuring text is easily readable, and making navigation seamless. It's crucial as it ensures websites provide an optimal viewing experience across different devices, be it a desktop or mobile screen.

Website Maintenance Services

Ensuring a website stays functional, up-to-date and secure. Website maintenance tasks include updating content, fixing bugs, speeding up performance, and integrating cutting-edge technologies.
